cloud.jgo.jjdom.dom

Interface HTMLNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Home, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    HTMLDocument, HTMLElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HTMLComment, HTMLDefaultDocument, HTMLDefaultElement

    public interface HTMLNode
extends java.io.Serializable, Home
    Author:
    Martire91
    This interface represents the html node
